mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
INSERT INTO tbchannel ( vcName , itype , vcArea , iBusinessAreaID , vcBusinessArea , numCredit , dtRegister , vcRegister , vcCapital , vcScale , vcState , vcRate , vcLegalPerson , vcChairman , vcCompanyTel , vcIntroduction , vcComplain , vcManageGroup , vcContractName , vcContractLevel , vcContractTel , vcContractPhone , vcContractEmail , iValid , dtCreate , dtModify ) VALUES ( #{vcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{itype,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{vcArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ibusinessAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{vcBusinessArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{numCredit,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{dtRegister,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{vcRegister,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vcCapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vcScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vcState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vcRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vcLegalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vcChairman,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vcCompanyTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vcIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vcComplain,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vcManageGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vcContractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vcContractLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vcContractTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{vcContractPhone,jdbcType=CHAR} , #{vcContractEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{ivalid,jdbcType=INTEGER} , #{dtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{dtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE tbchannel
vcName = #{vcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
iType = #{itype,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
vcArea = #{vcArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
iBusinessAreaID = #{ibusinessAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,

dtRegister = #{dtRegister,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
vcRegister = #{vcRegister,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
vcCapital = #{vcCapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
vcScale = #{vcScale,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
vcState = #{vcState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
vcRate = #{vcRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

vcChairman = #{vcChairman,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
vcCompanyTel = #{vcCompanyTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
vcIntroduction = #{vcIntroduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

vcManageGroup = #{vcManageGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,

iValid = #{ivalid,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
dtCreate = #{dtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,
dtModify = #{dtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
